column1: Smoque BBQ////This place never disappoints.  I ordered a feast for my family and friends - ribs
column5: salads and dessert - and even the cat got in on the Smoque BBQ action! So good... if you're wondering about this place
column6: don't.  Just go in (their patio is open) or do like me and order for pick-up. It'll be so worth it!
